ygData.subject: RE: Silver Ruby Veil
ygData.msgSnippet: A silver ruby veil only required an enchanted silver bar and a ruby. Due to their cost, I didn t even attempt one until my skill was in the high 90 s. We can
ygData.messageBody:
A silver ruby veil only required an enchanted silver bar and a ruby. Due to
their cost, I didn't even attempt one until my skill was in the high 90's.
We can also make a variety of bracers. You can see a complete listing of
what we can make in the Jewelry guide at
http://www.baelish.aust.com/everquest.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Henning Seljenes [SMTP:hseljenes@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 3:46 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Silver Ruby Veil
>
> From: "Henning Seljenes" <hseljenes@...>
>
> What does the sivler ruby veil require to make? Enchanted Silver, Ruby,
> and
> Cloth veil? What level should i be before I attempt this peice? Is there
> any
> other items we can make that cover armor slots (ie. not rings, earings,
> necklaces)?
>
>
